message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $20,000 is a bit out of my price range. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. What do you think?
Bob, thanks for the offer, but $12,000 is simply too low for me. This product is worth a lot more.  I could consider $18,000.
Alice, I understand your position, but $18,000 is still too high for me.  I'm willing to go to $14,000.  This is my final offer.  If you're not willing to accept it, I'll have to look elsewhere.
Bob, I appreciate you coming up.  I'm willing to compromise to close this deal quickly. How about we settle at $16,000?
Alice, I'm getting closer to your price, but I can only go up to $15,000.  If you're willing to meet me there, we can close this deal now.  Otherwise, I'll have to go with another seller.
